questions.questionLabel: What is a component in Angular?
Explain the purpose of the NgModule in Angular.
How do you create a new Angular application?
What is data binding in Angular, and what are the different types of data binding?
Explain the difference between {{}} (interpolation) and [property] (property binding) in Angular templates.
What is event binding in Angular, and how is it implemented?
What is Angular CLI, and how do you use it to generate components?
What is a directive in Angular? Can you name some built-in directives?
Explain the purpose of the Angular router and how to configure routes in an Angular application.
What is dependency injection in Angular, and why is it important?

answers.answerLabel: A reusable building block for the user interface
A style in Angular
A service for handling HTTP requests
A routing configuration
NgModule is used to declare and configure modules in Angular applications.
NgModule is a component in Angular.
NgModule is used for data binding in Angular.
NgModule is a directive in Angular.
You can create a new Angular application using the Angular CLI by running 'ng new app-name'.
You can create a new Angular application by writing HTML and CSS files.
You can create a new Angular application using pure JavaScript.
You can create a new Angular application using Python.
Data binding in Angular is a mechanism for synchronizing data between the component and the view.
Data binding in Angular is used for creating components.
Data binding in Angular is a routing feature.
Data binding in Angular is only available for services.
{{}} (interpolation) is used for displaying dynamic data in the template.
[property] (property binding) is used for displaying dynamic data in the template.
{{}} (interpolation) is used for creating CSS styles.
[property] (property binding) is used for creating services.
Event binding in Angular is used to capture and respond to user interactions like clicks and keystrokes.
Event binding in Angular is used for defining component styles.
Event binding in Angular is used for defining routes.
Event binding in Angular is used for dependency injection.
Angular CLI (Command Line Interface) is a command-line tool for creating, building, and deploying Angular applications.
Angular CLI is a component in Angular applications.
Angular CLI is a directive in Angular applications.
Angular CLI is a service for handling HTTP requests.
A directive in Angular is a marker on a DOM element that tells Angular to do something with that element.
A directive in Angular is a component.
A directive in Angular is a service.
A directive in Angular is a module.
The Angular router is a library for navigating between views and components.
The Angular router is used for handling HTTP requests.
The Angular router is used for data binding in Angular.
The Angular router is used for event binding in Angular.
Dependency injection in Angular is a design pattern used to provide instances of classes with their dependencies.
Dependency injection in Angular is a way to inject styles into components.
Dependency injection in Angular is a way to create routes in an application.
Dependency injection in Angular is used for data binding.
